reviews.review_text:
We found the restaurant's pamphlet in our room. We ordered chicken noodles, chicken biryani and tandoori full.

The packaging is decent and the food is tasty. The portion size is satisfactory as well. The food is delivered faster than expected. The pricing is reasonable as well.

Please check the menu is attached in the pics.

During our stay in south goa ( patnam) we visited this hotel for dinner and breakfast. For our dinner we ordered chicken hot garlic, chicken biryani and  chicken fried rice. Portion is good. One biryani is sufficient for one person. Taste is good. We ordered chicken hot garlic dry but it comes wet with gravy/salad only. Taste is good. Next day we visited for breakfast and ordered masala dosa, set dosa and kesari bath. Dosa is fried properly. Samabar taste is good. Chutney taste can be improved. Chutney was prepared with coconut which taste okay. This can be improved. Overall taste and price are good and affordable. I will suggest to visit this place.

Udupi Costal palate is one of the best restaurants in South Goa, where we had food..
We liked it so much that we visited next day for lunch after our dinner the previous night..

Fish Masala fry was simply delicious..Also tried Idli - it was as good as in south (Mysuru/Bengaluru). Even had Chapati and Gravy.. quantity of gravy was huge (sufficient for 4)

Overall, a must visit restaurant- especially if you are near Palolem..
Expect only good food and service .. No frills like fancy vibe, etc..
Good part is it is very economical..!

Must try King fish masala fry, Idli, Dosa..
